text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Advertisement" means a commercial message in any medium that aids, promotes, or assists, directly or indirectly, a rental-purchase agreement.
"Advertisement" does not include in-store merchandising ads.

text.section: "Cash price" means the price at which the lessor would have sold rental property covered by a rental-purchase agreement to the consumer unconditionally for cash on the date of consummation.
"Consumer" means an individual who rents personal property under a rental-purchase agreement primarily for personal, family, or household purposes.
"Consummation" means the time at which a consumer enters into a rental-purchase agreement.

"Lessor" means a person who regularly provides the use of personal property through rental-purchase agreements to consumers and to whom rental payments are initially payable on the face of a rental-purchase agreement.
"Rental property" means personal property that is the subject of a rental-purchase agreement.
